homepage.title: Welcome to Fisio MED
homepage.subtitle: Your trusted resource for all things physiotherapy
homepage.description: Fisio MED is a project by UNERS Maracay that aims to provide quality information and resources for physiotherapy students and professionals.

hero.title: Our profession, your hope
hero.subtitle: For those of us who study physiotherapy, this career represents much more than a profession, it is a vocation that connects us to the needs, challenges and hopes of people.

suggestedBooks.title: Recommended books
suggestedBooks.subtitle: Explore our selection of essential books for those starting out in the world of physiotherapy. Practical, theoretical and up-to-date resources that will accompany you in your academic and professional training.
